title: 外教中心的活動宣傳!!!!!!
content:
是的你沒看錯！跨文化交流活動連發！世界杯的活動在禮拜三中午，而這個甜點的活動在老時間老地方啦！🔥
這次我們要帶大家一窺世界各國有特色的甜點喔！當然少不了好吃的甜點跟好玩的活動囉！請愛吃甜食的同學們特別注意啦～😍🤤
報名人數有限喔～所以請大家告訴大家，不要錯過補充熱量的好機會喔😏🍰
快來報名「12/12-- 世界甜點甜滿你的心 Oh Goody ! Goodies from All over the World !!!」

Didn’t expect about this right! We got a back to back cross-cultural activity next week! On Wednesday noon and Thursday night 🔥
This time we’re gonna introduce the desserts all around the world, also some fun games about sweets that you’ll never wanna miss it😍🤤
Last but not least, we have a limit of our participants, so please tell someone who’s also interested in the sweetie! 😆🍰
Ps: There’s a chance you can make a cake😆🍰
***********************************************************
How to register報名方式：

https://forms.gle/gpCJuNWr8hwTKQ4TA

(Maximum participants 40, Register Now! )
最高參加人數 40，還不快報名!
***********************************************************
．Free Food is provided 提供免費輕食
．Make new friends in Taiwan 交新的朋友
．Share your country’s culture 分享貴國文化
．Language exchange opportunities 語言交流機會
When活動時間：2019/12/12 18:00-20:00
Where活動地點：德芳外語大樓一樓大廳 Fr. Franz Giet Building 1F
//參與活動者可以獲得英語自學點數一點喔 who ever attend this event will earn one self-learning point // 
http://i.imgur.com/iDoS3ja.jpg
